from .base_driver import BaseDriver

[docs]class FileDriver(BaseDriver):
    """
    BaseDriver

    The :class:`BaseDriver` class wraps IO sources of SBP messages and provides
    context management.

    Parameters
    ----------
    handle : port
      Stream of bytes to read from and write to.
    """


[docs]    def read(self, size):
        """
        Read wrapper.

        Parameters
        ----------
        size : int
          Number of bytes to read.
        """
        return_val = self.handle.read(size)
        if not return_val:
            raise IOError
        else: 
            return return_val

    def __init__(self, fd):
        self.handle = fd
